title: Adams National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar          How to use the Search for Events feature PLEASE NOTE: To search for events by dates, enter the Start AND End dates, then click on "Show Results" for a listing of programs. Or type in a keyword and click on "Show Results" to view programs by topic.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Adams National Historical Park Focus Tour - Henry Adams: An Education      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Old House at Peace field Fees: $10.00     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Get to know Pulitzer-prize winning Henry Adams a little better with a tour focused on his life.  This tour includes portions of the house not normally included in the guided tour. View Details      Adams National Historical Park Focus Tour - A Diplomatic Legacy: Charles Francis Adams      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Old House at Peace field Fees: $10.00     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Enjoy a tour focused on diplomat Charles Francis Adams, the son and grandson of Presidents who decided to pave his own way to success. View Details      Adams National Historical Park Fee Free Days: National Park Service's 100th Birthday!      Location: Adams National Historical Park Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Help the National Park Service celebrate its 100th Birthday with free entry into all National Parks! View Details      Adams National Historical Park Meet the Founders on Founders' Day!      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Adam National Historical Park Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Meet a Founding Father, Mother, and Son on Founders' Day as we celebrate the 100th Birthday of the National Park Service! View Details
